nodes.bodyText:
I ask you to to add a code comment here (and in the documentation (.adoc file)) , because I struggled some time to understand this line. It got clear, when I read the Javadoc of TimeZone.getTimeZone(...) which points out

returns the specified TimeZone, or the GMT zone if the given ID cannot be understood.
Please revert this change as it has nothing to do with the issue/PR (and will most probably result in merge conflicts of #236)
